forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 3 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear. Low around 46, with temperatures rising to around 48 overnight. Southwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the morning unfolds under a clear blue sky, bathing the city in sunlight and promising a day that feels invigorating and refreshing. The temperature hovers just above sixty, a gentle reminder of the city's cool coastal nature, yet it seems to be falling slightly as the hours pass. The air is crisp but carries a warmth that invites exploration. With the lightweight northwest winds barely whispering through the streets, there is little to veil the striking views of the Golden Gate and the vibrant cityscape, unobstructed by fog or the marine layer that often blankets the region this time of year.

As the sun makes its descent into the evening, expect the skies to remain mostly clear, drawing down the temperatures to a comfortable forty-six. A light sweater or a light jacket will be an advisable companion for those who find themselves out and about later, ready to enjoy the twinkling city lights against the backdrop of a deepening indigo sky. It’s a wonderful day to stroll through the city’s parks, perhaps taking the time to visit the local shops, grab a coffee from a favorite café, or simply bask in the majestic views from Twin Peaks as the sun sinks below the horizon. The serenity of the day invites a sense of calm and contemplation, beckoning one to slow down and savor the beauty all around.
